description.fr:
{Affinity:38}\_: Inflige {magicalDamage:Affinity.38.hurA} autour<sprite name="cell_around"> de votre héros.
\---
{NEUTRALGAUGEvalue:Affinity.38.jauge,+} si {value:Affinity.38.target} adversaires sont touchés.
description.en:
{Affinity:38}: Does {magicalDamage:Affinity.38.hurA} around<sprite name="cell_around"> your hero.
\---
{NEUTRALGAUGEvalue:Affinity.38.jauge,+} if {value:Affinity.38.target} opponents are hit.
description.es:
{Affinity:38}: Inflige {magicalDamage:Affinity.38.hurA} alrededor<sprite name="cell_around"> de tu héroe.
\---
{NEUTRALGAUGEvalue:Affinity.38.jauge,+} si {value:Affinity.38.target} adversarios son alcanzados.
description.de:
{Affinity:38}: Verursacht {magicalDamage:Affinity.38.hurA} ringsum\_<sprite name="cell_around"> deines Helden.
\---
{NEUTRALGAUGEvalue:Affinity.38.jauge,+}, wenn {value:Affinity.38.target} Gegner getroffen werden.
description.pt:
{Affinity:38}: Inflige {magicalDamage:Affinity.38.hurA} em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> do herói.
\---
{NEUTRALGAUGEvalue:Affinity.38.jauge,+} se {value:Affinity.38.target} adversários forem atingidos.

bgDescription.fr: La force est noire, c'est noir comme cet anneau qui sert d'étendard, tel un drapeau. Venez, basculez de son côté.
bgDescription.en: The force is dark, as dark as this ring that serves as a banner or flag. Come over to the dark side.
bgDescription.es: La fuerza es oscura como este anillo que sirve de estandarte, cual bandera. Adéntrate a su lado.
bgDescription.de: Die Macht ist finster – wie dieser Ring, der wie eine Fahne als Standarte dient. Los, komm auf die dunkle Seite.
bgDescription.pt: A força é negra, como este anel que serve de estandarte, como uma bandeira. Venha para este lado da força.
